revised_title: The Influence of Bodily Labour on Nitrogen Discharge
tldr: This study investigates the impact of physical labor on the body's nitrogen discharge. The author found that physical exertion increases the discharge of nitrogen, which could affect the body's metabolism and nutrition. The research confirms previous findings by Dr. Parks and provides insights into the relationship between exercise, diet, and human health.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human Physiology
